question: Union Cabinet has approved Submarine Optical Fibre Cable Connectivity between Lakshadweep Islands and which city?
explanation:
The Union Cabinet headed by the Prime Minister has approved establishment of Submarine Optical Fibre Cable Connectivity between Kochi and Lakshadweep Islands.
The project is proposed to be established at a cost of Rs.1,072 crore that includes operational maintenance of the project for a period of 5 years. The proposed project would connect 11 islands of Lakshadweep.
